metadata.scenario: Customer support interaction about a billing issue

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm really frustrated. I was just charged $150, but my plan is supposed to be $100. I've been a customer for years, and I've never had this happen before!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let me look into that for you right away. Can you please provide me with your account number or the phone number associated with your account?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 555-123-4567. I'm just confused about where this extra charge came from. Is there a hidden fee I missed, or did the price of the plan increase without notification?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I've reviewed your account. It appears there was an accidental charge for premium international calling that was applied in error. I have now refunded the $50 difference, and it should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days. I sincerely apologize for the error and any inconvenience this has caused. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
